node.title: In the US, KR, RU or BR? Special BitTorrent-Themed AR Point Hunts Are Now Available!
node.content:
Expanding on our collaboration with PointsVille, the newest augmented reality (AR) and consumer rewards application, now available on Google Play and the App Store, we’re announcing a new batch of BitTorrent-themed AR points in select countries and cities.

BitTorrent users in the United States, South Korea, Russia and Brazil can earn even more points in the anticipated treasure hunt locations listed below. If you’re not in one of the locations, don’t worry as you can still collect BitTorrent-themed AR points through daily BitTorrent-sponsored AR hunts and gamefied experiences in the PointsVille mobile app. Head over to https://www.pointsville.com to learn more or to download.

United States

New York City – Times Square, Rockefeller Center

Los Angeles – Universal Studios Hollywood, Disneyland Park

Chicago – Navy Pier, Millenium Park

South Korea

Seoul – N Seoul Tower, Bongeunsa Temple in Gangnam

Busan – Gamcheon Culture Village, Haeundae beach

Incheon – Songdo Central Park, Chinatown

Russia

Moscow – Red Square, Gorky Park

St. Petersburg – Hermitage/Winter Palace, Moskowsky District

Novosibirsk – Novosibirskiy Zoopark, NOVAT Opera

Brazil

Sao Paulo– Ibirapuera Park, Mercado Municipal

Rio de Janeiro– Copacabana Beach, Cristo Redentor

Brasilia– Cathedral of Brasilia, National Congress
